view_definition_query: select noti.read, noti.date, noti.idnotification, noti.idaccounts, noti.idslumptests, slt.value, slt.idprojects, prj.name from consulgal.notifications as noti left join consulgal.slumptests as slt on slt.idslumptests = noti.idslumptests left join consulgal.projects as prj on prj.idprojects = slt.idprojects
